content: of change color 1 round 7 note mark any edc as this will be chain 6 join with slip_stitch to form loop where you will join in round 8 round 1 chain 5 counts as 1st treble_crochet & chain 1 *treble_crochet chain 1* round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in 3 sts *half_double_crochet in 11 times join with slip_stitch in 4th chain of starting chain next st ehdc in next st double_crochet in 2 sts edc in 5 fasten_off 12 treble_crochet & 12 chain 1 next st double_crochet in 2 sts ehdc in next st half_double_crochet in next st + single_crochet in 6 sts* 5 times repeat from * color 2 to + single_crochet in 2 sts join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet fasten beg cluster = chain 2 double_crochet in same chain off 90 total sts cluster = 2dctog in same chain cluster v = cluster chain 1 cluster in same chain color 2 round 8 join in marked edc chain 3 counts as round 2 join in any chain 1 beg cluster chain 1 cluster in 1st double_crochet double_crochet in same st *double_crochet in 4 sts double_crochet increase* 17 same chain 1 *cluster-v in next chain 1* 11 times join times double_crochet in 4 sts join with slip_stitch in top chain of with slip_stitch in top of beg-cluster fasten_off 12 cluster-v starting chain 3 fasten_off 108 double_crochet color 3 color 3 round 3 join in any chain 1 chain 1 single_crochet in same st *7 round 9 join in same st chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet in next chain 1 single_crochet in next chain 1* 5 times 7 double_crochet ehdc ehdc in 107 sts join with slip_stitch in top chain in next chain 1 join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet fasten_off of starting chain 3 fasten_off 108 ehdc 42 double_crochet & 6 single_crochet color 4 color 4 round 10 join in next st chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st round 4 join in center double_crochet of any 7 double_crochet chain 1 single_crochet half_double_crochet in 2 sts *half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet in 5 sts* 17 times in same st *9 treble_crochet in next single_crochet skip 3 sts single_crochet in next half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet in 2 sts join with slip_stitch in 1st half_double_crochet st* 5 times 9 treble_crochet in next single_crochet join with slip_stitch in 1st fasten_off 126 half_double_crochet single_crochet fasten_off 54 treble_crochet & 6 single_crochet color 5 color 5 round 11 join in next st chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet round 5 join in center treble_crochet of any 9 treble_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in in 125 sts join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet fasten_off same st *9 dtr in next single_crochet skip 4 sts single_crochet in next 126 single_crochet st* 5 times 9 dtr in next single_crochet join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet fasten_off 54 dtr & 6
